GSD.description:
net: ieee802154: fix null deref in parse dev addr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.12 by commit fdd51e34f45311ab6e48d2147cbc2904731b9993. For more details please see the references link.
